My external device is not working. What should I do?
responses: If your external device is not responding, try checking the connection to your computer and make sure it is properly connected. Finally, try using a different device to determine if the problem is with the device or your computer.

input: How do I make chocolate chip cookies?
I want to bake chocolate chip cookies
Can you share a chocolate chip cookie recipe?
responses: To make chocolate chip cookies, you will need the following ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, vanilla extract, eggs, and semi-sweet chocolate chips. First, preheat the oven to 375°F. Then, cream together the butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract in a mixing bowl. Add in the eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined. Stir in the chocolate chips. Drop spoonfuls of the cookie dough onto a baking sheet, leaving space in between each cookie. Bake for 8-10 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown. Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Let the cookies cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

input: How do I make spaghetti bolognese?
I want to cook spaghetti bolognese
Can you share a recipe for spaghetti bolognese?
responses: To make spaghetti bolognese, you will need the following ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, onion, garlic, canned tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine, beef broth, salt, pepper, and olive oil. First, cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions. Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the onion and garlic and sauté until translucent. Add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a wooden spoon. Drain any excess fat. Add the canned tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine, beef broth, salt, and pepper to the skillet. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened. Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

input: How do I make pancakes?
I want to make pancakes for breakfast
Can you share a recipe for pancakes?
responses: To make pancakes, you will need the following ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, milk, egg, unsalted butter, and sugar. In a mixing bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar. In a separate bowl, whisk together the milk, egg, and melted butter. Gradually add the wet mixture to the dry mixture, stirring until just combined (it's okay if there are some lumps in the batter). Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat. Use a ladle or measuring cup to scoop the batter onto the pan, making pancakes of the desired size. Cook the pancakes until bubbles start to form on the surface and the edges start to dry, then flip them over and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes on the other side. Serve the pancakes with your choice of toppings.

Serve the pancakes with your choice of toppings, such as maple syrup, butter, fruit, or whipped cream.

input: How do I make chicken soup?
I want to make some homemade chicken soup
Can you share a recipe for chicken soup?
responses: To make chicken soup, you will need the following ingredients: chicken, onion, carrot, celery, garlic, bay leaves, salt, pepper, and chicken broth. In a large pot, add the chicken and enough water to cover it. Bring the water to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let the chicken simmer for 45-60 minutes, or until fully cooked. Remove the chicken from the pot and set it aside to cool. Once the chicken is cool enough to handle, remove the meat from the bones and chop it into bite-sized pieces. In the same pot, add the onion, carrot, celery, garlic, bay leaves, salt, pepper, and chicken broth. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 30-45 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender. Add the chopped chicken back to the pot and let it cook for an additional 5-10 minutes. Remove the bay leaves before serving.

Add the chopped chicken back to the pot and let it cook for an additional 5-10 minutes. Remove the bay leaves before serving. You can also add noodles or rice to the soup if desired.

input: How do I make chicken stir-fry?
I want to cook chicken stir-fry for dinner
Can you share a recipe for chicken stir-fry?
responses: To make chicken stir-fry, you will need the following ingredients: boneless, skinless chicken breasts, soy sauce, cornstarch, sesame oil, garlic, ginger, onion, broccoli florets, sliced carrots, sliced bell pepper, and vegetable oil. Begin by slicing the chicken breasts into thin strips, and then marinate the chicken in a mixture of soy sauce, cornstarch, and sesame oil for at least 10 minutes. In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over high heat. Add the garlic, ginger, and onion to the skillet, and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes. Add the chicken to the skillet, and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through. Add the broccoli, carrots, and bell pepper to the skillet, and stir-fry for an additional 3-5 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender-crisp. Serve the chicken stir-fry over rice or noodles, and garnish with sliced green onions, if desired.

Serve the chicken stir-fry over rice or noodles, and garnish with sliced green onions, if desired. You can also add additional vegetables or spices to the stir-fry, like snow peas, mushrooms, or red pepper flakes, to make it your own.

input: How do I make spaghetti carbonara?
Can you share a recipe for spaghetti carbonara?
I want to cook spaghetti carbonara for dinner
responses: To make spaghetti carbonara, you will need the following ingredients: spaghetti pasta, bacon, eggs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and black pepper. Begin by cooking the spaghetti pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, fry the bacon in a large skillet until crispy, and then remove it from the skillet and chop it into small pieces. In a mixing bowl, beat the eggs, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and black pepper together until well combined. When the pasta is cooked, reserve a cup of the pasta water, and then drain the pasta and add it to the skillet with the bacon. Remove the skillet from the heat, and then add the egg mixture and pasta water to the skillet, stirring until the sauce is creamy and the pasta is coated. Serve the spaghetti carbonara hot, and garnish with additional Parmesan cheese and black pepper, if desired.

Remove the skillet from the heat, and then add the egg mixture and pasta water to the skillet, stirring until the sauce is creamy and the pasta is coated. Serve the spaghetti carbonara hot, and garnish with additional Parmesan cheese and black pepper, if desired. You can also add other ingredients to the carbonara, such as peas, mushrooms, or spinach, to add more flavor and nutrition to the dish.

input: How do I make scrambled eggs?
Can you give me a recipe for scrambled eggs?
I want to make scrambled eggs for breakfast
responses: To make scrambled eggs, you will need the following ingredients: eggs, butter or oil, milk (optional), salt, and pepper. Begin by cracking the eggs into a bowl and whisking them until the yolks and whites are fully combined. Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and add some butter or oil to the pan. Once the butter has melted or the oil is hot, pour in the egg mixture. Let the eggs cook for a few seconds without stirring, and then use a spatula to gently push the eggs from the edges of the pan towards the center. Continue to push and fold the eggs until they are cooked to your desired consistency. If you like creamy scrambled eggs, you can add a splash of milk to the eggs before whisking. Season the scrambled eggs with salt and pepper to taste and serve immediately.

input: How do I do push-ups?
What is the proper form for push-ups?
How many push-ups should I do?
responses: To do push-ups, start in a plank position with your hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body until your chest touches the ground, then push back up to the starting position. Repeat for your desired number of reps. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-20 reps.

The proper form for push-ups involves keeping your body in a straight line, engaging your core, and lowering your body until your chest touches the ground. Make sure to keep your elbows close to your body and your hands directly under your shoulders.
It's best to start with a small number of push-ups and gradually increase as you get stronger. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-20 reps.

input: How do I do squats?
What is the proper form for squats?
How many squats should I do?
responses: To do squats, stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointed slightly outward. Lower your body as if you're sitting in a chair, making sure to keep your knees behind your toes. Push back up to the starting position and repeat for your desired number of reps. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-20 reps.
The proper form for squats involves keeping your chest up, your back straight, and your knees behind your toes. Make sure to engage your core and keep your weight in your heels.
It's best to start with a small number of squats and gradually increase as you get stronger. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-20 reps.

input: How do I do lunges?
What is the proper form for lunges?
How many lunges should I do?
responses: To do lunges, start with your feet together and take a step forward with one foot. Lower your body until your front knee is bent at a 90-degree angle, then push back up to the starting position. Repeat on the other leg and alternate for your desired number of reps. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-20 reps.

The proper form for lunges involves keeping your upper body straight, your shoulders back, and your core engaged. Make sure to keep your front knee behind your toes and your back knee hovering just above the ground.
It's best to start with a small number of lunges and gradually increase as you get stronger. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-20 reps.

input: How do I do a plank?
What is the proper form for a plank?
How long should I hold a plank?
responses: To do a plank, start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body until your forearms are resting on the ground, and your elbows are directly under your shoulders. Keep your body in a straight line from your head to your heels and hold for your desired amount of time. Aim to hold for 30-60 seconds.
The proper form for a plank involves engaging your core, squeezing your glutes, and keeping your body in a straight line. Make sure to breathe deeply and evenly throughout the exercise.
It's best to start with a shorter amount of time and gradually increase as you get stronger. Aim to hold for 30-60 seconds.

input: How do I do sit-ups?
What is the proper form for sit-ups?
How many sit-ups should I do?
responses: To do sit-ups, lie on your back with your knees bent and your feet flat on the ground. Cross your arms over your chest or place your hands behind your head. Engage your core and lift your upper body until your elbows touch your knees. Lower back down to the starting position and repeat for your desired number of reps. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-20 reps.
The proper form for sit-ups involves keeping your feet on the ground, your lower back pressed into the floor, and your neck in a neutral position.
It's best to start with a small number of sit-ups and gradually increase as you get stronger. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-20 reps.

input: How do I do a deadlift?
What is the proper form for a deadlift?
How many deadlifts should I do?
responses: To do a deadlift, stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointed slightly outward. Bend your knees and lower your hips while keeping your back straight. Grab the weight with an overhand grip and lift it up while extending your hips and knees. Lower the weight back down to the ground and repeat for your desired number of reps. Aim to do 3 sets of 8-12 reps.
The proper form for a deadlift involves keeping your back straight, your chest up, and your knees behind your toes. Make sure to engage your core and use a weight that you can lift with proper form.
It's best to start with a lighter weight and gradually increase as you get stronger. Aim to do 3 sets of 8-12 reps.

input: How do I do a bench press?
What is the proper form for a bench press?
How many bench presses should I do?
responses: To do a bench press, lie on a flat bench with your feet on the ground and your hands gripping the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Lower the barbell to your chest, then push it back up to the starting position. Repeat for your desired number of reps. Aim to do 3 sets of 8-12 reps.

The proper form for a bench press involves keeping your back flat on the bench, your feet on the ground, and your elbows tucked in at a 45-degree angle. Make sure to engage your core and use a weight that you can lift with proper form.
It's best to start with a lighter weight and gradually increase as you get stronger. Aim to do 3 sets of 8-12 reps.

input: How do I do bicep curls?
What is the proper form for bicep curls?
How many bicep curls should I do?
responses: To do bicep curls, stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms at your sides holding dumbbells. Curl the dumbbells up to your shoulders, then lower them back down to the starting position. Repeat for your desired number of reps. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-15 reps.

The proper form for bicep curls involves keeping your elbows close to your body, your wrists straight, and your back straight. Make sure to engage your core and use a weight that you can lift with proper form.
It's best to start with a lighter weight and gradually increase as you get stronger. Aim to do 3 sets of 10-15 reps.

input: How do I do a shoulder press?
What is the proper form for a shoulder press?
How many shoulder presses should I do?
responses: To do a shoulder press, stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold dumbbells at shoulder height with your palms facing forward. Press the dumbbells up and overhead, then lower them back down to the starting position. Repeat for your desired number of reps. Aim to do 3 sets of 8-12 reps.
